description: A representation of the semantic enrichments Data Return Card.
title: Data Return Card

ci_id.description: Impresso canonical ID of the content-item (e.g. `GDL-1900-01-02-a-i0001`)

issue_id.description: Impresso canonical ID of the issue to which this issue belongs (e.g. `GDL-1900-01-02-a`)

partner_institution.description: Internal alias corresponding to the partner institution this CI comes from.

institution_data_ids.description: The legacy institution IDs corresponding to this content-item.

items.description: A content item (e.g. article, advertisement, radio broadcast, etc.)

impresso_data.description: All the S3 paths to the corresponding objects and enrichments in the Impresso data.

prepared_data.description: The data stages and S3 paths corresponding to the prepared data for this CI.

items.description: The name and corresponding S3 path of this CI's data representation or enrichment.

semantic_enrichments.description: The semantic enrichments and their s3 paths for this CI.

items.description: A content item (e.g. article, advertisement, radio broadcast, etc.)

id.description: Legacy or institution identifier linked to the CI.

granularity.description: Granularity level this identifier corresponds to. At least one ID must be issue-level

is_primary.description: Whether the identifier is used as primary or anchor identifier by the insitution.

is_permanent.description: Whether the identifier is stable and/or permanent (eg. ark ID).

is_public_facing.description: Whether the identifier is public facing, ie. if it is present in an insitution URL which could be used.

corresp_url.description: URL containing or using this identifier linking to the piece of content corresponding to this CI in the institution portal or interface.

notes.description: Notes, description or useful information relating to this identifier.

datastage_name.description: Name of the data stage or enrichment linked.

datastage_schema_link.description: GitHub Link to the datastage's JSON schema.

s3_path.description: S3 URL to the data or enrichment with this CI (e.g. `s3://112-canonical-final/LeTemps/GDL/issues/GDL-1900-issues.jsonl.bz2` for canonical issues).
